features: Detachable Motorized Floor Nozzle: Eureka NES310 comes with the motorized brushroll, which helps loosen up particles and dust on multi-surfaces.350.0 watts.Specific uses:hard floor
Powerful pick up: Nonstop suction power picks up particles like dust and pollen, while the washable filtration system captures the debris.
Easily Converts to Handvac: For convenient above floor cleaning, reaching tight spaces, stairs and even car interiors. Remove the nozzle and you have a handvac with or without the long stick.
Built-in Versatile Tools : No more concern about looking for the attachments here and there. The built-in crevice tool and dusting brush are extremely convenient for quick clean-up for small places.
Lightweight & Easy to Maneuver: At only 4 lbs. Swivel steering provides excellent control and makes it easy to maneuver around and reach under furniture.
body.description: We know you value a clean home and Eureka is proud to offer whole home cleaning solutions to make life a little easier.Eureka Upgraded Blaze 3-in-1 Lightweight Corded Stick Vacuum your new go-to for all your cleaning needs! With powerful suction power, lightweight design and advanced swivel steering, you can effortlessly navigate around hardwood floors, furniture, stairs, car interiors, and ceilings!Our portable vacuum cleaner for home boasts a motorized brush roll that captures even the tiniest specks of dust and dirt, leaving your home spotless. And its large and washable dust cup and filter means longer cleaning time.This handheld vacuum also features multiple built-in accessories for cleaning tight corners and narrow crevices, while its free-standing feature allows rest when cleaning. Whether you're a busy professional living in an apartment or a homeowner looking for essential cleaning tools, our mini vacuum is your perfect solution!If you have any questions, contact our customer service team at 1-800-282-2886.Warning: When using the vacuum cleaner, the floor brush may be clogged by hairs and dirt. We recommend cleaning the roller brush and the belt every 2 weeks.Long-term failure to clean may cause malfunction, or even risk of smoke and belt broken.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Introducing Eureka Corded Stick Vacuum NES310

Motorized Brushroll Small in size, but not in power. With a motorized brush roll, Eureka NES310 is ideal for bare floor, hardwood, and tile Floor. Lightweight Easy to carry around. Perfect for smaller jobs where you don't have to lug out the big vacuum or broom. Easy to Maneuver With swivel steering, you can easily clean every corner and those hard-to-reach places comfortably from any angle.

Clean challenging spots Nonstop suction power allows you to clean stairs and car floor mats effectively and with ease. Crevice Tool Cleans hard-to-reach areas such as corners, baseboard edges, dryer vents, chairs, and sofas. Dusting Brush Use the dusting brush to vacuum blinds, lampshades, curtains, vents, or upholstered surfaces. Extended Reach Whether under furniture or above floor, the lightweight hand vacuum with the long stick allows you to clean from the ground to the ceiling and everything in between. Handheld Vac for Stairs Crevice Tool Dusting Brush Long Stick for High-Above

Free Standing Embodies the ergonomic design and low center of gravity, which makes cleaning even more comfortable. It can stand up alone anywhere, without leaning on the wall or returning back to the dock. Easy to Assemble Eureka NES310 comes in only 3 pieces. Just intuitively snap each part together, and you’re ready to go! Easy-Empty Dust Cup See the debris immediately falls into the bin, no fuss - and more importantly no mess. Emptying into the trash without having to touch anything. Washable Filter Keep your vacuum working great for longer with the washable filter. Be sure to let the filter dry at least 24 hours before its next use. Where to purchase a replacement for the Washable Filter? Replacement Filter: Directly search for B0B27WVCZH on Amazon

Eureka Blaze, NES215A Eureka 3-in-1, NES310 Eureka Flash Corded Stick, Carpet Cleaning Expert, NES510 Weight 3.2 lbs 4 lbs 7.4 lbs Motor Wattage 240 W 300 W 500 W Attachments Crevice Tool, Dusting Brush Built-in Crevice Tool and Dusting Brush Crevice Tool, Dusting Brush, Portable Storage Base Cleaning Path 9.8 inches 10 inches 11 inches Swivel Steering ✓ ✓ ✓ Floortype Hard Floor and Low Pile Carpet Hard Floor and Tile Hard Floor and Carpet

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 10, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This baby has more power than you think
reviews.reviewText: I love this little vacuum. It's so light-weight and easy to use. The handle pops out easily. The roller attachment is a little difficult to take off and put back on, but I get it done eventually. So far, I've mostly used it for floors and it does a great job. The dust container is small, of course, so I have to dump it after every room, but that's a reflection of the size of the tool and really can't be helped. As some have said, the cord is on the short side too, but I can get one largish room done without moving the plug. It's worth it to have the extra power provided by home electricity instead of weak batteries.We have an office in a nearby town and we didn't want to buy a new vacuum just for that little space, so this vacuum is PERFECT. I can just pick it up, toss it in the back of my car, and take it out at the office and use it there, then reverse the process and bring it home. So lightweight and easy to move it around.I believe someone said something about the pet hair being blown all over the place by the air vents, but I have not had that problem AT ALL. My dog is half german shepherd and let me tell you, she SHEDS. This vacuum sucks up all that hair so easily I'll probably never use the broom again! lolFabulous value for the money so far.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 20, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I moved into a very small apt. So it’s great for easy storage and handling. Sometimes the brush stops rolling for some reason and I have to turn it on and off to get it back to rolling. Suction isn’t the greatest but does the job on hard floors, stairs and short thread rugs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The ease in handling it
reviews.reviewText: I love it ,picks up great even goes over my throw carpets it’s easy to use goes in the corners great.There is nothing to dislike,I love it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Beater Bar Stops Working After a Few Moments
reviews.reviewText: This was a waste of money. The motor in the beater bar just decides to stop working once it gets warm. So I can go about 2 stairs before the brush stops. After taking a one minute break it'll do another two stairs. I'd return it but I'm past the return window.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great small vac!
reviews.reviewText: Easy to use, light and suction is good. For the money it is worth buying for quick cleanup. Gets hair and dust easily.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My other item died
reviews.reviewText: Great to use very light to use

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Has a Roller brush
reviews.reviewText: It stated in the description there was a roller brush which it does. Not the greatest in suction though

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Perfect size for an apartment
reviews.reviewText: Definitely lightweight. Does the job perfect. Comes with attachments. Long wire. 4 stars because the extension only stays at one length

reviews.reviewTitle: Practica, fácil de usar y económica
reviews.reviewText: Esta muy práctica y sencilla de usar esta aspiradora, ya tengo unos meses con ella y todo bien! Es para trabajo sencillo y lugares pequeños
Es una aspiradora compacta y versátil, fácil de usar. Muy recomendable para departamentos pequeños donde no hay espacio para guardar. Es potente y sirve perfecto en piso duro y en alfombras.

reviews.reviewTitle: Buena, pero los alcances son muy basicos
reviews.reviewText: Me parece una pequeña aspiradora muy buena para las funciones basicas, quiza quitar el polvo de las cortinas, aspirar los sillones y cojines, y excelente en la funcion como barredora, de verdad recoge todo del piso, tiene un cepillo giratorio que ayuda a la funcion de barrer, se percibe el calentamiento del motor a partir de los 5 minutos, la he usado en periodos de 30 a 40 minutos sin notar que su desempeño decaiga. E punto mas negativo es que el cepillo giratorio del accesorio de barredora se atasca en los tapetes de pelo corto, aspira bien el tapete pero el cepillo se atasca y no gira, para volverlo a habilitar he tenido que desmontar el accesorio y volverlo a colocar. Hace poco ruido, es muy ligera y el cabezal telescopico la hace llegar a todos rincones. Por el precio me parece una buena compra para departamentos y espacios pequeños
Hace falta el accesorio para poder usarse como aspiradora de mano

El diseño excelente, pero la potencia no es lo que busco, no es suficiente para aspirar lo cotidiano que cae en un tapete ni en sillones. Solo funciono sobre vitropiso y superficies de ese tipo. Si solo va aspirar sobre piso, es buena
